title: Connect uploaded audio file to MusicPlayer for real playback

requirements.text: Configure the MusicPlayer to play the user-uploaded audio file for the track “Hum Tere Pyaar Mein — Lata Mangeshkar” by setting the runtime audio source (import.meta.env.VITE_HUM_TERE_PYAAR_MEIN_AUDIO_SRC) to the uploaded file’s public asset path, so clicking Play plays the real song (not the fallback tone).
acceptanceCriteria: When VITE_HUM_TERE_PYAAR_MEIN_AUDIO_SRC points to the uploaded audio file (a public asset path), pressing Play starts HTMLAudioElement playback of that file and loops it.
If the configured source is missing/empty/unplayable, the MusicPlayer continues to function and falls back to the existing generated-tone behavior without UI errors or crashes.
No Spotify link playback is attempted; playback uses only a direct audio file source (local public asset path).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Backend must remain single-actor; do not introduce additional backend services.
Use English for any user-facing text in the build request.
Spotify track links cannot be used as playable audio sources; only direct audio file URLs or local public assets are supported.
nonGoals: Adding Spotify embed/integration or playing audio directly from open.spotify.com links.
Implementing backend storage, uploads, or audio hosting logic.
